name: Plate Twist
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a weight plate with both hands in front of your stomach, with your arms straight and your palms facing each other.
2. Twisting your torso to the left, keeping your arms straight, bring the weight plate across your abs towards your right shoulder.
3. Continue twisting until your body has rotated about 45 degrees.
4. Hold for a brief moment to engage your core muscles.
5. Return to the starting position and repeat on the other side.
short_summary: The Plate Twist is an abdominal exercise that targets the obliques, performed with a weight plate held in front of the body.
